nodes.text: Cerdana was the capital city of the Altiri species on the planet Altiria/Anarris. Cerdana, considered the pinnacle of Altiri society and culture, was strategically located along the shores of the planet's longest river. Cerdana was considered by some to be strikingly beautiful. Altiri believed that each structure should reflect the designer's personality and function as both a building and a work of art. As a result, many different architectural styles came together to create a cityscape that was a perpetually developing example of Altirian culture.
Cerdana had a spaceport and was the seat of the democratic government of the Altiri.
